Class CompositePaintStrategy

java.lang.Object
model.strategies.paint.CompositePaintStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPaintStrategy
public class CompositePaintStrategy extends Object implements IPaintStrategy
A strategy that has multiple IPaintStrategies inside.

Phoebe Scaccia
